attributes.action: Remove benefit reassessments for people with degenerative physical conditions
attributes.additional_details: I have been to tribunal court twice to have my PIP re-awarded even though I have a genetic degenerative disease which limits my life and will never improve but only get worse.
attributes.background: We want the DWP to remove the need for individuals to have their benefit claims (such as Personal Independence Payment) reassessed where the individual suffers from life-limiting degenerative physical health conditions in which there will never be an improvement during their lives.
